column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Lots of great choices for tapas and delicious sangria! We got the White Peach Sangria which is light and fruity
column2: perfect for a hot summer day. For tapas we got the Goat Cheese Baked in Tomato Sauce
column5: and Pork Shoulder Paella. The paella was my favorite dish and I'd highly recommend it!! The goat cheese baked in tomato sauce was also very good!
